column1: #Text=What are your thoughts on the job Marco Rubio has done as Senator and what would you have done differently than him ?
#Text=I think Rubio has done just as good a job as any Senator — and that is exactly the problem .
#Text=Rubio is a horse-trader , a slimy smiler , the quintessential politician .
#Text=He believes in nothing , save what his advisers tell him to believe in .
#Text=I would have stuck to my positions and acted as a Senator , rather than simply setting myself up for a run for the presidency .
#Text=Do you see political correctness as a problem in today 's society ?
#Text=If so , what can you do as a Senator to address it ?
#Text=: I see political correctness as a huge problem in today 's society .
#Text=But whether fortunately or unfortunately , there is nothing a Senator can do to address it .
#Text=I am a firm believer in the separation of powers , and the Senate has a very limited set of responsibilities .
#Text=Moreover , this PC phenomenon we are witnessing is a cultural problem that must be addressed at a cultural level , not a legal one .
#Text=That is up to the American people themselves , not the legislature .
#Text=Whereas the House of Representatives is the house of the people , the Senate was originally meant to be the house of the States .
#Text=What are your views on the 10th Amendment and how will you reflect the interests of Florida through your votes ?
#Text=: I am a big believer in States rights , and my modus operandi as Senator will be to repeal as many laws as possible that hinder the ability of the States to govern their own affairs .
#Text=What specifically will you do as a Senate candidate and Senator to promote libertarianism ?
#Text=: Simply leading by example is enough to promote libertarianism .
#Text=I do not believe in shoving political ideology down people 's throat anymore than I believe in doing so with religion .
#Text=Being a Pagan , I do not feel the need to evangelize and convert Christians ; neither do I , as a Libertarian , feel the need to evangelize and convert Republicans and Democrats .
#Text=The proof of a thing is in its fruits .

#Text=Repealing laws , correcting the balance between the Federal Government and the States , reinforcing the separation of powers , destroying the Federal Reserve : these acts will in themselves promote our political philosophy .
#Text=For you , what would constitute a successful term as Senator ?
#Text=The System is so corrupted that the destruction of even one Department , Bureau , or Administration could be considered a great success .
#Text=Invictus describes the chats as a " brilliant idea " he has replicated in his campaign .
